name: Fey Spirit (UA)
languages: Sylvan, understands the languages you speak

trait.name: Hit Points
text: equal the fey's Constitution modifier + your spellcasting ability modifier + ten times the spell's level

trait.name: Fey Step
text: As a bonus action, the fey can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Darkening Step (Deceitful Only)
text: Immediately after using its Fey Step, the fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which remains until the end of the fey's next turn.

trait.name: Ecstatic Step (Joyful Only)
text: Immediately after using its Fey Step, the fey can choose a creature it can see within 10 feet of it and force it to succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be charmed by the fey for 1 minute. The charm ends if the fey or any of its companions deals any damage to the target.

trait.name: Impassioned Step (Furious Only)
text: Immediately after using its Fey Step, the fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level piercing damage + 1d6 force damage.

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: 2020 Spells And Magic Tattoos p. 5
